New Records: De'Aaron Fox broke a tie with Mitch Richmond for the third-most steals in franchise history with his 671st career steal
Miscellaneous Highlights: De'Aaron Fox is on pace to pass Doug Christie and take the steals crown for the Sacramento era this season
De'Aaron Fox is just in his age-26 season and has already reached 10,000 career points, becoming the fifth player in franchise history to do so
Others: De'Aaron Fox is on the exclusive list of players with 10,000 career points or more with Hall of Famers Oscar Robertson, Jack Twyman, Mitch Richmond, and Tiny Archibald
